They have also experienced moments of conflict resolution, with Neighbors A apologizing to Neighbors B and working towards reconciliation. Additionally, Neighbors A's forgetfulness and Neighbors B's helpfulness in reminding and supporting Neighbors A demonstrate their camaraderie and cooperation.
